entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day18
entry.content: I suppose that a public undertaking about some softwares(web?) will be needed.

entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day18
entry.content:
I started using Synergy. This software makes me to be able to share a Mac keyboard and mouse to a Windows machine. For example, when I use a Mac keyboard, I can type a windows machine by using mac keyboard.

I use a HappyHackingKeyboard that is so small but if I put my MacbookAir 11-inch, I feel my desk is too confined to type a keyboard HHKB.

Synergy had some bugs when Mavericks had started available. But now, I can use this normally.

This is a great software!!!

entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day17
entry.content: Push Bullet is very good tool for me. Because of this, I can kill the notification sound of my android device.

entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day16
entry.content:
I forgot to write a dialy that is second times.

YESTERDAY, I went to Tokyo International Airport to take a photo. I took many photos of plane and building.
Tarminal 2 that is for national airlines is very fine. International Terminal is too. But Terminal 1 is a little dark i suppose.

But this air port is very good place for me bcz there is many planes I like it.

I wanna go there some other time when I have a time.

entry.title: 30days Charange 20140207- Day15
entry.content:
I drove a car first time today.

I felt I can drive. But I know I dont look around there. I suppose all beginner driver get the ability more and more.

forgot. Driving is so fun for me!!!
